Articles.Content:
The idea that F2 should completely remove the HUD and all other info (other mods included) and to have the screen viewed in an all natural native pristine condition. That is just the scene and vessel objects are visible.

Maybe the mod would be able to do this behind the scene. So the HUD can remain visible but the screenshot is just the scene and vessel objects. Selectable HUD options could also be in the mix. Further imagine if the pristine video feed could be recorded.

Anyone interested in this project?

Where the idea was first discussed:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104605-F2-no-longer-pristine!

Regarding the name, I posted this in the other thread:

Picture Perfect, perhaps.
Edited January 4, 2015 by leopardenthusiast

Picture Perfect has a good ring to it. How about combination and result in, Pristine Pic's.

The name should capture the essence of what this mod wil deliver and all suggestions are warmly welcome.
